keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit HTML Help
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit HTML Help

section.p: A Microsoft product that generates (X)HTML Help files during the DITA build process. HTML Help is a compiled help system.

HTML Help is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs. The HTML Help compiler must be installed in your DITA processing environment for DITA Open Toolkit to function, but it is not part of the Toolkit installation package.
